name: UWU: Universal World Union
description:
UWU: Universal World Union is a short exploration game set in the ruins of a fully automated luxury communist utopia. The player takes on the role of a robot sent to investigate a member of a subversive organization.

The game was made in Unity as part of a class at the Royal Danish Academy's Games and Interaction Design program. Play time is about 10 minutes, and in some ways it is more of a proof of concept than a fully fleshed out game.

CREDITS

  • Esben Holk Nielsen: Art direction, concept art, 3D assets, 2D assets, procedural generation
  • Yixin Song: Level design, narrative design
  • Ella Tamara Albeck Grandjean: Concept art
  • Stine Boesgaard: 3D lead, level design, 2D assets, asset management
  • Jo Dalsgaard: Programming lead, narrative lead, production management, level design, sound design, music
